game.name: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play 휴대전화, Remote Play 태블릿, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Be the leader of wobblers from ancient lands, spooky places, and fantasy worlds. Watch them fight in simulations made with the wobbliest physics system ever created, make your own wobblers in the unit creator and send your army off to fight your friends in multiplayer.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Be the leader of wobblers from ancient lands, spooky places, and fantasy worlds. Watch them fight in simulations made with the wobbliest physics system ever created, make your own wobblers in the unit creator and send your army off to fight your friends in multiplayer.

reviewHighlights.text: 아이디어는 신선하지만 반복적인 플레이와 얕은 게임성 때문에 금방 흥미를 잃게 되어 추천하기는 어렵습니다.
뇌 빼고 하면 개재밌음 시간 순삭임. 근데 업뎃이 1년에 1번 있을까 말까 라서 직접 모드 깔아서 추가 콘텐츠 하는게 기다리는거 보다 정신에 좋음.
